Section.Catchline: County property appraiser ex officio tax assessor for district.

SectionBody.Text: The amount of any such annual taxes so levied for general obligation bonds or as additional security for revenue bonds or assessment bonds shall be certified by the district board to the property appraiser of the county who shall be ex officio tax assessor for the district, and such taxes shall be levied and collected in the same manner as other general county taxes.
